message.name: ERR_ACCOUNTVIEW_DATES_INVALID
message.locale: The from date entered should be earlier than the to date

message.name: ERR_CASEDECISIONCOMPONENT_XRV
message.locale: Multiple pre-release decision records found. Please contact your supervisor

message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_FININSTRUCTIONID_ZERO
message.locale: An invalid value (zero) was specified for the financial instruction.

message.name: ERR_ILI_RNFE_LBYINSTRUCTION
message.locale: No details exist for the specified financial instruction "%1s".

message.name: ERR_INSTRUCTIONLINEITEM_XFV_FININSTRUCTIONID
message.locale: Could not find any line item records for the financial instruction.

message.name: ERR_PAYSLIPCOMPONENT_XFV_DUPRECIPIENTILI
message.locale: PaySlipComponent record already exists for recipient type "%1s" and InstructionLineItemId "%2s", cannot re-create the PaySlip.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_METHOD_INVALID
message.locale: The method of receipt type "%1s" is not supported and cannot exist as an instrument type on the system.

message.name: ERR_NOINSTRUCTION_GENERATED
message.locale: There is no instruction associated with this line item as it is yet to be processed.

message.name: ERR_FV_CURRENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: A currency must be entered.

message.name: INF_TOT_AMT_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total amount of records processed:

message.name: INF_TOT_RECS_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of records processed:

message.name: INF_AMT_PAID
message.locale: Amount Paid

message.name: INF_DETAILS
message.locale: Details

message.name: INF_AMT_DUE
message.locale: Amount Due

message.name: INF_CLIENT_NAME
message.locale: Client Name

message.name: INF_AMOUNT
message.locale: Amount

message.name: INF_EFFECTIVE_DATE
message.locale: Effective Date

message.name: INF_NOMINEE
message.locale: Nominee

message.name: INF_EFT_PAYMENT_WITH_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_SUBJECT_TEXT
message.locale: An EFT payment could not be created for Case %1s of type %2s as nominee %3s has no bank account.

message.name: INF_EFT_PAYMENT_WITH_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_SUBJECT
message.locale: The Case %1s could not be approved as the Nominee %2s has no bank account.

message.name: INF_EFT_PAYMENT_WITH_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_FC_SUBJECT
message.locale: The Financial component %1c could not be assigned for Case %2s as the Nominee %3s has no bank account.

message.name: INF_EFT_PAYMENT_WITH_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_DEFAULT_NOMINEE_SUBJECT
message.locale: The default nominee could not be changed for the Case %1s as the Nominee %2s has no bank account.

message.name: INF_EFT_PAYMENT_WITH_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_REASON
message.locale: An EFT payment could not be created as a nominee has no bank account.

message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_AMT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Amount must not be less than zero.

message.name: INF_NO_INSTRUCTION_FOR_OVERALLOCATION
message.locale: This allocation line is related to an amount that has been over allocated to the liability. Because this amount has not yet been processed and allocated to a different liability, there is no related instruction to view.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REGENERATEIND_AND_NOMINEE
message.locale: Please select to reissue the payment to either a new nominee or the original nominee.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION
message.locale: Deduction

message.name: INF_REISSUED
message.locale: Reissued

message.name: INF_MANUAL_PAYMENT
message.locale: Manual Payment

message.name: INF_DEBIT
message.locale: Debit

message.name: INF_CREDIT
message.locale: Credit

message.name: INF_AMOUNT_ON_DATE
message.locale: %1n on %2d

message.name: INF_AMOUNT_DUE_DATE
message.locale: %1n due %2d

message.name: INF_LIABILITY_WRITE_OFF
message.locale: Liability Write Off

message.name: INF_NOTIFICATION_XRV_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC_SUBJECT
message.locale: The Case %1s could not be approved as the Nominee %2s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: INF_NOTIFICATION_XRV_DEFAULT_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC_SUBJECT
message.locale: The default nominee could not be changed for the Case %1s as the Nominee %2s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: INF_NOTIFICATION_XRV_CHANGEDELIVERYPATTERN_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC_SUBJECT
message.locale: The Delivery Pattern %1s could not be changed as the Nominee %2s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: INF_NOTIFICATION_XRV_COMPONENTASSIGNMENT_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC_SUBJECT
message.locale: The Financial component %1c could not be assigned for Case %2s as the Nominee %3s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: INF_REPLACEMENT_LIABILITY
message.locale: Replacement Liability

message.name: INF_REPLACEMENT_RECEIPT
message.locale: Replacement Receipt

message.name: INF_REVERSED_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: Reversed Line Item

message.name: INF_INCONSISTENT_AMOUNT_DETECTED_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Inconsistent amounts detected on case - %1s

message.name: INF_INCONSISTENT_AMOUNT_DETECTED_NOTIFICATION_BODY
message.locale: Inconsistent amounts were detected during reassessments of case "%1s". Please contact an administrator.

message.name: INF_REASSESSMENT_AMOUNT_MISMATCH_DETECTED
message.locale: An inconsistency between the reassessment statement breakdown total and the rolled up list level total amounts has been detected on case - "%1s" at "%2d". The transaction has been rolled back. Please contact an administrator for further information.
